Name: Pud Pud in Weird World
About the game: Originally released in 1984 for the ZX Spectrum, this classic surreal platformer saw players take on the role of Pud Pud, a bizzare yellow ball-like creature with wings and a giant chomping mouth, trying to survive in the appropriately named Weird World. Now, relive those days in this remastered emulated version. Gameplay Explore the Weird World by walking or flying and find the 10 hidden bowls of pudding to find the secret exit. Some creatures can be eaten to replenish energy, while others damage you. Beware the fearsome Mrs Pud Pud, for her kiss is deadly! This enhanced version introduces a number of modern features to this retro classic, including: Saving/loading the game at any point Support for most modern game controllers Full control remapping Image scaling and smoothing options
